name: Closer
description: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.

review.author: Fella_shibby
review.heading: Truth clarifies but it does not bring people closer.
review.reviewBody:
I first saw this a decade ago on Sony Pix channel.

Revisited it recently.

The movie has top notch star cast n solid performances.

The movie is very engrossing n I found it to be darkly comical.

The way Larry messes with Dan's mind is a big lol n Dan's face when Larry reveals him the truth is again rofl.

Jude Law is epic as Dan.
